concept.title: MME support for adding s1hoResourceReleaseWithNoMmeSgwRel timer (Feature f10568-01)
concept.shortdesc: This feature supports a new timer s1hoResourceReleaseWithNoMmeSgwRel instead of existing s1hoResourceRelease timer, which is used to guard in intra-MME and intra-S-GW HO scenarios to initiate release towards the source eNB. This feature also supports increase in the resolution of the MME and the AMF timers from 100 milliseconds to 50 milliseconds.

conbody.p: When s1hoResourceReleaseWithNoMmeSgwRel timer is set to 0, the MME falls back to use the old s1hoResourceRelease.
This timer is used in case of intra-MME HO with or without TAU, and intra-MME HO without S-GW relocation.
